name: SRNE 5kw Inverter Off Grid
description:
Discover the power of the SRNE 5Kw Off Grid inverter – robust, efficient, and perfect for home use. Designed by SRNE Solar, this cutting-edge inverter features Rated Power of 5,000W and a Max. Peak Power of 10,000VA. Moreover, its single MPP tracker ensures seamless solar energy management. Furthermore, this
inverter is compatible with both Li-ion and Lead acid batteries offering flexibility for various energy storage setups.

• In spite of its impressive capabilities, the SRNE 5Kw
Off Grid
Inverter remains easy to use and, most importantly, safe for your home. In addition, it’s designed to deliver consistent power output throughout its lifetime.For those seeking even greater power capacity, consider the
SRNE 10Kw Off Grid Inverter. Alternatively, the Luxpower 5Kw
Off Grid Inverter
is another excellent choice that presents similar features.

Efficient

• Outputs high quality pure sine wave AC power• Up to 6 units in parallel connection meet the needsReliable• Industrial design with a modern aesthetic look• Easy to install and simple to useUser-friendly• 360 degrees of security from hardware to software• IEC safety approvalsSafety• Solar charge controller up to 100A charging currentAll-in-one• Exclusive Li-ion battery BMS dual activation• Time-slot function to save cost with peak-valley tariff
short_description: Discover the power of the SRNE 5Kw Off Grid inverter – robust, efficient, and perfect for home use. Designed by SRNE Solar, this cutting-edge inverter features Rated Power of 5,000W and a Max. Peak Power of 10,000VA. Moreover, its single MPP tracker ensures seamless solar energy management. Furthermore, this inverter is compatible with both Li-ion and Lead acid batteries, offering flexibility for various energy storage setups.

name: SRNE 3KW 60a Hybrid Off Grid Inverter (HF2430S60)
description: HF Series is new hybrid solar charge inverter, which integrates PV charge &Grid(Generator) charge with AC sine wave output. Adopting DPS control algorithm, getting higher response speed, higher reliability and higher industrial standard.\n\nParallel 2 x 12V batteries to get your 24v system working.
short_description: HF Series is new hybrid solar charge inverter, which integrates PV charge &Grid(Generator) charge with AC sine wave output. Adopting DPS control algorithm, getting higher response speed, higher reliability and higher industrial standard.

name: SRNE All-In-One 3.5kw (3.5kw 5.12kWh 24V) (SREOV2435)
description:
SRNE All-In-One 3.5kw (3.5kw 5.12kWh 24V) (SREOV2435) is an all in one package that makes solar energy storage and distribution quick and easy to install.



SRNE All-In-One 3.5kw (3.5kw 5.12kWh 24V) (SREOV2435)



Easy to upscale




Up to 4 batteries in parallel expand to 20.48kWh



Up to 2 systems in parallel with double storage & output




Easy to install




No matching and commissioning required, ready to install



Plug-and-play, eliminate the clutter of wires




User friendly




Get started quickly and use it instantly



Min. width of just 13cm, saving space in the home




Intelligence




Time-slot function to save on electricity costs



Large LCD screen with real-time data




Safety




High quality lithium iron phosphate cells



Proven Li-ion battery management solutions




Designed for families




Support Off-grid/Hybrid/On-Grid output



Multiple charge and discharge modes available
